H0.text: One day is about how long it takes for Earth to make one revolution around the Sun.

H1.text: One week is the approximate time it takes for Earth to make one revolution around the Sun.

H2.text: One month is about how long it takes for Earth to make one revolution around the Sun.

H3.text: One year is the approximate time it takes for Earth to make one revolution around the Sun.

A4.text: One complete orbit takes 365.256 days (1 sidereal year)
